/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their gray and brown facades blending harmoniously with the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the concrete jungle.
